flavor_text_entries.flavor_text: Les Grahyèna forment des meutes de dix quinexcellent au travail de groupe pour capturer leursnproies.
Es jagt in Rudeln von ungefähr zehn Magnayen. BeimnEinkreisen der Beute arbeiten sie perfekt zusammen.
MIGHTYENA gives obvious signals whennit is preparing to attack. It starts tongrowl deeply and then flattens its body.fThis POKéMON will bite savagely with itsnsharply pointed fangs.
MIGHTYENA travel and act as a packnin the wild. The memory of its life in thenwild compels the POKéMON to obey onlyfthose TRAINERS that it recognizes tonpossess superior skill.
In the wild, MIGHTYENA live in a pack.nThey never defy their leader’s orders.nThey defeat foes with perfectlyncoordinated teamwork.
It will always obey the commands of anskilled TRAINER. Its behavior arises fromnits living in packs in ancient times.
It will always obey the commands of anskilled TRAINER. Its behavior arises fromnits living in packs in ancient times.
It chases down prey in a pack.nIt will never disobey the commandsnof a skilled Trainer.
It chases down prey in a pack.nIt will never disobey the commandsnof a skilled Trainer.

It chases down prey in a pack ofnaround ten. They defeat foes withnperfectly coordinated teamwork.
It chases down prey in a pack ofnaround ten. They defeat foes withnperfectly coordinated teamwork.
Il traque ses proies en groupe.nIl ne désobéira jamais auxnordres d’un bon Dresseur.
It chases down prey in a pack.nIt will never disobey the commandsnof a skilled Trainer.

It chases down prey in a pack.nIt will never disobey the commandsnof a skilled Trainer.
すぐれた　トレーナーの　めいれいにはnぜったい　ふくじゅう。おおむかしにnむれで　こうどうしていた　なごり。
우수한 트레이너의 명령에는n절대복종한다. 먼 옛날n무리를 지어 행동했던 영향이다.
Il obéit toujours aux ordres de son Dresseur si celui-cinest très doué. Son comportement vient de l’époquenreculée où il vivait en meute.
Es wird stets die Befehle eines begabten Trainersnbefolgen. Dieses Verhalten geht darauf zurück,ndass es früher im Rudel lebte.
Siempre obedece a los buenos Entrenadores. Estánacostumbrado a vivir en jaurías en estado salvaje.
La sua eccezionale obbedienza verso gli Allenatorinesperti deriva dall’antica abitudine di vivere in branchi.
It will always obey the commands of a skillednTrainer. Its behavior arises from its living in packsnin ancient times.
優れた　トレーナーの　命令にはn絶対に　服従。大昔にn群れで　行動していた　名残り。
１０ひき　ていどの　むれを　つくってnいっしみだれぬ　チームワークでnえものを　おいつめて　しとめるのだ。
10마리 정도의 무리를 이루어n한 치의 흐트러짐 없는 팀워크로n먹이를 쫓아 꼼짝 못하게 한다.
Forman manadas de diez individuos y cercan a susnpresas valiéndose de un trabajo en equipo impecable.
Una decina di Mightyena per branco cacciano ensconfiggono il nemico con un perfetto lavoro dingruppo.
It chases down prey in a pack of around ten.nThey defeat foes with perfectlyncoordinated teamwork.
１０匹　程度の　群れを　作ってn一糸乱れぬ　チームワークでn獲物を　追いつめて　しとめるのだ。
どうもうな　うなりごえを　あげながら　しせいをnひくく　している　ときは　こうげきの　まえぶれ。nするどく　とがった　キバで　がぶりと　かみつく。
사납게 으르렁거리는 소리를 내며 자세를n낮추고 있는 것은 공격의 전조이다.n날카롭고 뾰족한 이빨로 덥석 문다.
On peut facilement deviner quand Grahyèna se prépare ànattaquer. Il grogne et se met à plat ventre. Ce Pokémon mordnsauvagement ses ennemis avec ses crocs acérés.
Magnayen sendet deutliche Signale aus, wenn es sich aufneinen Angriff vorbereitet. Es knurrt heftig und macht sich flach.nDieses Pokémon kann mit seinen spitzen Zähnen brutalnzubeißen.
Es muy fácil prever cuándo va a atacar Mightyena; se ponena gruñir con fuerza y se estira. Este Pokémon da unosnmordiscos tremendos con los afilados colmillos que tiene.
Mightyena invia chiari segnali quando sta preparandonun attacco. Inizia a ringhiare cupo e si appiattisce.nMorde selvaggiamente con le zanne appuntite e affilate.
Mightyena gives obvious signals when it is preparing to attack.nIt starts to growl deeply and then flattens its body.nThis Pokémon will bite savagely with its sharply pointed fangs.
どう猛な　うなり声を　あげながら　姿勢をn低く　している　ときは　攻撃の　前触れ。n鋭く　とがった　キバで　がぶりと　かみつく。
グループで　こうどうしていた　やせいの　ちがnのこっているので　すぐれた　トレーナー　だけをnリーダーと　みとめて　めいれいに　したがう。
그룹으로 행동하던 야생의 피가n남아 있어서 우수한 트레이너만을n리더로서 인정하고 명령을 따른다.
Les Grahyèna vivent et se déplacent en meute.nLeurs réminiscences de la vie sauvage les poussent à n’obéirnqu’aux Dresseurs qu’ils considèrent comme réellementntalentueux.
Magnayen zieht in Gruppen durch die Wildnis.nDurch seine Erfahrungen in der Wildnis hört es nurnauf Trainer, die außergewöhnliche Fähigkeiten haben.
Mightyena se desplaza y vive con su jauría en estado salvaje.nPor eso, acostumbrado a esta libertad, obedece al Entrenadornal que considere realmente dotado de habilidades superioresnal resto.
Allo stato brado Mightyena si sposta e agisce soltantonassieme al suo branco. A causa della sua natura selvaticanobbedisce solo a quegli Allenatori che considera possederenabilità superiori.
Mightyena travel and act as a pack in the wild. The memorynof its life in the wild compels the Pokémon to obey onlynthose Trainers that it recognizes to possess superior skill.
グループで　行動していた　野生の　血がn残っているので　優れた　トレーナー　だけをnリーダーと　認めて　命令に　従う。
